attributes.action: Give all homecoming troops from Iraq and Afghanistan a homecoming parade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Twenty five years ago our returning troops from The Falklands were rewarded with a street Parade in recognition of all they achieved and sacrificed in the conflict. The current conflicts have already seen more soldiers killed than 25 years ago and the signs are that more will die. This petitions success is the least they deserve.
